channel.title: Star of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the star of the day.

item.title: Failed supernova
item.description: A failed supernova is an astronomical event in time domain astronomy in which a star suddenly brightens as in the early stage of a supernova, but then does not increase to the massive flux of a supernova. They could be counted as a subcategory of supernova imposters. They have sometimes misleadingly been called unnovae.
